entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 20 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023
